original_text: For I will not venture to speak of anything except what Christ has accomplished through me to bring the Gentiles to obedience—by word and deed,
korean_text: 그리스도께서 이방인들을 순종하게 하기 위하여 나를 통하여 역사하신 것 외에는 내가 감히 말하지 아니하노라 그 일은 말과 행위로

sentences.original_text: For I will not venture to speak of anything
except what Christ has accomplished through me
to bring the Gentiles to obedience
